issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.cleveland.com/advice/2024/06/dear-abby-should-i-let-them-know-aging-father-plans-to-leave-assets-to-charity-not-family-members.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cleveland.com%2Fadvice%2F2024%2F06%2Fdear-abby-should-i-let-them-know-aging-father-plans-to-leave-assets-to-charity-not-family-members.html) ### Comment > Other tkts for same issue on other websites are 182517, 180077, 182340, 182176, 181350. > > On one of those tickets yoh asked me to enable the annoyance filters. With the filter enabled, for this report, I get a blank white page instead of content. With the filters off, I get the pop-up that an adblocker has been detected. I didn't retry all the other ticker numbers with the annoyance filters enabled but I did do a few the other day and updated those tickets. They have the same behavior as what I'm experiencing here so I would assume even the untested ones would do the same. These websites are from links from the Google Discover feed. They have the same exact behavior if I try to open them in the Google app as they do on Chrome ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nlkr5rfkda8w8osww0scc4soo8o0cwgd5m1k4fwcw0.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: www.javatpoint.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175538) if other issue.

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1DP4y1P7FX/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2Fvideo%2FBV1DP4y1P7FX%2F) ### Comment > I'd like to address the issue where a video player prompts users to log in after playing for a few minutes when they're not logged in. Sometimes, the prompt reappears after a while even after the user closes it.
